resources.string: Silhouette of a stonefly in a circle

Macroinvertebrate Classifier is an image classifier, for offline, in the field.
 
The classifier has the correct macroinvertebrate 80% of the time in its top 3 predictions. (That becomes 88% among the top 5 predictions.) 
The top prediction is correct 60% of the time, so if possible, take multiple images of the same specimen and confirm the predictions based on a textual description. 

 
This app can be used to identify 21 taxa of benthic (freshwater/river) macroinvertebrates:
 Aquatic worm
 Black fly
 Caddisfly
 Clam/mussel
 Crane fly
 Crayfish
 Damselfly
 Dobsonfly
 Dragonfly
 Gilled snail
 Leech
 Lunged snail
 Mayfly
 Midge fly
 Planaria
 Rat-tailed maggot
 Riffle beetle
 Scud
 Sowbug
 Stonefly
 Water penny beetle

The (planned) report functionality will generate PDFs for Licking County's Stream Team or the Ohio Historic River's Stream Quality Monitoring (SQM) programs.
 
Developed by Maxwell Budd.
 
This app uses the following Open-source libraries:
 - Joda-time
 - Glide
 - Tensorflow-litej
No generic beetle larvae category is classified with the image search function (the three-group macroinvertebrate tally asks about generic beetles).

More Resources (not associated with this app):
 
https://macroinvertebrates.org: online high-res image set with explanations and guides to practice identifying macroinvertebrates yourself.
 
https://iNaturalist.org: upload images and location to contribute to online nature tracking community effort. Others can help you identify. iNat app available from inaturalist.org.
 
https://LifeInFreshWater.net: more information on each taxon.

If you do not agree to the privacy policy, do not continue to use the app.

        
The Privacy Policy can be viewed at 
 &privacyurl;
    
(This link can be accessed later from the (About) menu.
(Click here to open Privacy Policy in browser)

The app requests the following permissions as needed:
 - Camera - to take photos to identify
 - File system write - to save these photos
 - File system read - to load these photos to identify
 
All data and files are stored entirely on your device and never collected on our servers.
 These terms may be updated as functionality is added to the app. You will be notified of changes in a launcher like this one, but the most current privacy policy will always be found at &privacyurl;.
I accept the normal use of my data in this app (Macroinvertebrate Classifier) as described by the privacy policy at &privacyurl;.
